title: Video Utilization and Quiz-Based Accountability Strategies for Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields, with provided digital devices and project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners complete at least 80% of a 6-minute video lecture
Learners pass video-based quizzes with an average accuracy of 90% or higher
Learners apply mathematical concepts acquired through videos and quizzes to real-world case analyses
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
